series.title: Images of America: Mississippi
series.description:
Mississippi local and regional history books feature vintage images of small towns and downtowns across the state. Each title celebrates the unique cultures and traditions of the 'Magnolia State' through historical images and descriptive captions. 
    
    From the landmarks, lifestyles, and leisure activities of early residents in Natchez, to Oxford and trading post deals that led to a new school in Ole Miss, maritime history in the calm waters of Biloxi's Back Bay, and the towns of Gulfport, Jackson, Vicksburg, Holly Springs, Greenwood, and more, each book features stunning vintage images revealing the unique people, places, and events that make up the history of the great state of Mississippi.
